    • saveNewButton

      private void saveNewButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Saves the user entered data as a new appointment. Contains the lambda "lambda" which uses the funcitonal interface isOverlapping. The lambda contains the logic used to determine if an appointment is overlapping with any existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The button click.
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQLException
      IOException - IOException

    • saveChangesButton

      private void saveChangesButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Updates the appointment that is currently being edited. Contains the lambda "lambda" which uses the funcitonal interface isOverlapping. The lambda contains the logic used to determine if an appointment is overlapping with any existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The button click.
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQLException
      IOException - IOException

    • generateAppointmentTimes

      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<LocalTime> generateAppointmentTimes()
      Generates a list of times between the EST office hours. Contains the lambda "l2" which uses the functional interface Util.lambdaTwo. The "l2" lambda holds the method call to convert a given time (t) from the timezone EST to the local time zone.
      Returns:
      The list of times.
